title: Stephania: An In-Depth Look at a Traditional Herb Supplement
description: Stephania, also known as Stephania tetrandra, is a traditional Chinese herb that has been used for thousands of years in traditional Chinese medicine. The root of the Stephania plant is the part of the plant that is used medicinally. It is a perennial vine that is native to China, Japan, and Korea.
